snippet: Kelley Currin has sounded the alarm about predatory practices in the swimming community after her coach abused her. Now the Government Accountability Office has been tasked with examining how youth athletic clubs handle abuse allegations.
abstract: Kelley Currin sounded alarm about predatory practices in swimming community when she revealed that, beginning in the 1908s when she was 13, her coach Rick Curl sexually abused her; USA Swimming allowed Curl to continue coaching despite her revelations, and as a result of her lobbying efforts, the Government Accountability Office has been tasked with examining how youth athletic clubs handle such abuse allegations.
lead_paragraph: Kelley Currin has sounded the alarm about predatory practices in the swimming community after her coach abused her. Now the Government Accountability Office has been tasked with examining how youth athletic clubs handle abuse allegations.

headline.main: After Sexual Abuse Conviction, New Scrutiny on Youth Athletics
headline.print_headline: After a Coach’s Conviction for Abuse, A New Scrutiny for Youth Athletics
